reviewText: Great series.  I had the older VHS tapes and they were failing.  Bought this for my Grandson, 4.5 yrs.  A little to intense at his age so I will shelve them for another 2 years and then he should be more than ready.
My kids loved these movies. Now the next generation is getting to know Mcgee.

Our kids watched these in the 80's and 90's and loved them. I ordered these for my grandson's 4th birthday and now all three grandsons are enjoying them!! Love the fact that Biblical values never change or grow old! I recommend these to all parents and grandparents.
Great for children - 6 and up - shows real life events and how to deal with it in a Christian way.
